titleStmt.title: Discommendatory verses, on those which are truly commendatory, on the author of the two Arthurs, and the Satyr against wit.
titleStmt.author: Blackmore, Richard, Sir, d. 1729.

notesStmt.note: Reproductions of the originals in the Harvard University Library (reel 1439), and the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (reel 1755).
